dialogue.text: I've stopped trying to solve myself. Now I'm just curious about what happens next.

psychological_notes: Major shift from self-as-problem to self-as-process. Evan has released the exhausting project of self-optimization, replacing desperate seeking with gentle curiosity. This represents profound psychological maturation—identity no longer requires solving.
philosophical_underpinning: Being as ongoing process rather than problem to solve
therapeutic_direction: Beyond therapy—natural unfolding replacing forced growth
